data.name: Microbrewery Tycoon
data.detailed_description:
Having accumulated the start-up capital, you have finally realized your long-standing dream and opened your own microbrewery.
There was a long way ahead of you to create a customer base, compete and comprehend the art of brewing craft beer.

Game features:
- 106 styles of beer
- 46 types of ingredients
- campaign of 10 scenarios with a single plot
- creating your own unique beer styles
- various customers offering 4 types of contracts
- organization of production lines to automate the brewing process
- organization of beer transportation to customers
- personnel management
- you can open and equip your own pubs
- more than 150 unique quests.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Economic strategy about microbrewery management. Your craft beer should become famous all over the world!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
